thread.title: Foodie Help
thread.title_full: Foodie Help - Review of Archer Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: buff4evr
title: Foodie Help
text:
My Daughter and I were having trouble finding food in NYC! (I know, the only day of the year. Christmas Day) We saw Archer Hotel and decided to stop for a small bite to eat.
The menu was limited, thus we decided to move on. Here is where the most wonderful employee ever, Troy comes into the picture. He continued to serve his paying hotel guests, while searching for us. He is amazing! We were being picky and he still was kind and diligent. Thank you Troy. If all Hotels had a Troy, there would never be a dissatisfied customer.
